hey hey hey quiet down plz!

The quality is pretty good, if you take the size in account. It really is 720p. 
"Video: MPEG4 Video (H264) 1280x544 (256:109) 23.98fps [Video]
Audio: AAC 48000Hz stereo [Audio]"

V: 6
A: 6

I think it's not worth watching on my computer-screen because the bitrate is too low which shows in visible banding of dark areas. And I hate banding. 
The sound is good, but I have trouble following the dialogue. 

This is about the same size of movies I put on my mobile (240x320/400). I think I'll use it just for that (after recoding).  

I think it defeats the purpose of High Definition, and therefore it shouldn't be in the "highres film" category , but it's not utter crap. So stop complaining.
